
# Heading 1
This is a normal paragraph.

## Heading 2
**Bold text**
*Italic text*
~~Strikethrough text~~
***Bold and italic***
[Link to example](https://example.com)

### Heading 3

* Bullet item 1
* Bullet item 2

  * Nested bullet

1. Numbered item 1
2. Numbered item 2

|        |        |
|--------|--------|
|Header 1|Header 2|
|Cell 1  |Cell 2  |

``inline code
